query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_ota_device_status (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  deployment_id INT NOT NULL,
  device_id INT NOT NULL,
  previous_version VARCHAR(50),
  target_version VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('pending','downloading','downloaded','installing','verifying','completed','failed','rollback') DEFAULT 'pending',
  progress INT DEFAULT 0,
  download_progress INT DEFAULT 0,
  install_progress INT DEFAULT 0,
  error_code VARCHAR(50),
  error_message TEXT,
  retry_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  max_retries INT DEFAULT 3,
  started_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  downloaded_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  installed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rolled_back_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  logs JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_ota_status_deployment (deployment_id),
  INDEX idx_ota_status_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_ota_status_status (status)
);

  install_progress INT DEFAULT 0,
  error_code VARCHAR(50),
  error_message TEXT,
  retry_count INT DEFAULT 0,
  max_retries INT DEFAULT 3,
  started_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  downloaded_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  installed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  completed_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rolled_back_at TIMESTAMP NULL,
  logs JSON,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_ota_status_deployment (deployment_id),
  INDEX idx_ota_status_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_ota_status_status (status)
